data.text: @SteveRa47196066 @KLFY She isn’t a highly paid (by taxpayers) member of the White House Office of Correspondence.

@naboutte @KLFY But do you believe elected officials on taxpayer salaries should be held to the same traditional standards that you and I observe every day in the private sector? 

We used to say elected officials should be held to even higher standards.
@KLFY Gotta love what KLFY reports on these days. Real journalism here, folks. Long gone are the days from the 1990s when they were worth watching.

@KLFY That is both rude and condescending. I would never do that to someone who took the time to write me a letter addressing a concern I had. Someone really needs to teach this teacher proper etiquette. I don't believe I would want her instructing my children in that manner.
@KLFY But what does she know about being a successful business person, or about being the greatest President of the United States? Nothing! She just wants to criticize!
